title: Surf's Up Sunday
description: Join us at the I-95/RT.22 overpass to protest the rising tide of authoritarianism, bring your own sign or borrow one from us. Together, we will call out these damaging actions and work to make waves and turn the tide.
meeting_location: Suggested Parking: Park and Ride Lot, Rt. 22 and Technology Drive, 3663 Churchville Rd  Aberdeen, MD
raw_text:
You‚Äôre Invited!
NOKINGS KING HEALTHCARE NOT WARFARE
DEAR America in association with
PRESENTS
A Special Rush Hour Resistance:
‚ÄúSurf‚Äôs Up‚Äù
Sunday
‚ÄúIndividually, we are one drop.
Together, we are an ocean.‚Äù
-Ryunosuke Satoro
In the US, we are witnessing the rising tide of authoritarianism that has eroded democratic norms and is restricting basic civil rights. Join us at the I-95/RT.22 overpass to call out these damaging actions and make it clear we will not just ‚Äúget over it‚Äù! Bring your own sign or borrow one of ours as we work together to make some waves and turn the tide. Together, we can; together we will!
I-95 and RT 22 Overpass
Aberdeen, Maryland
Suggested Parking: Park and Ride Lot
Rt. 22 and Technology Drive
3663 Churchville Rd  Aberdeen, MD
Sunday
July 6, 2025
5 - 7 PM
Weather Dependent
Changes Posted on our Signal Protest Chat
CONTACT US
dearamerica704
@gmail.com
dear-america.com
raw_summary: The image is a flyer for an event titled ‚ÄúSurf‚Äôs Up‚Äù Sunday, organized by DEAR America in association with TWW (Together We Will) and the Visibility Brigade. The event aims to protest authoritarianism by gathering at the I-95 and RT 22 overpass in Aberdeen, Maryland, on July 6, 2025, from 5 to 7 PM.

title: Olympia Visibility Brigade Protest
description: Join us for a public protest hosted by the Olympia Visibility Brigade. Bring your protest signs, costumes, and enthusiasm as we stand up for democracy.
raw_text:
Impatient for the next big protest? Us too! Join us weekly to make good trouble!

OLYMPIA VISIBILITY BRIGADE

We deploy each weekend on overpasses in the Olympia-Tumwater-Lacey area
We also deploy on Mondays during evening rush hour
We support Capitol protests when possible

Bring your high-viz protest signs, flags, fun costumes,
a good mood, and be tolerant of terrible dancing.
Introverts welcome!

Upcoming Event:
Monday, July 7th @ 4:30 - 6:30 pm
Pedestrian bridge over I-5, Lacey

DEMOCARCY IS UNDER ATTACK
STAND UP FIGHT BACK!

Look for upcoming Olympia Visibility Brigade events at theblop.org and backbonecampaign.org

Attendees are encouraged to bring protest signs and other items. More details about their events can be found on the specified websites.

title: Celebration of Science, Learning, and Libraries
description: Join us to advocate against the elimination of critical funding to libraries, cuts to science grants, and attacks on education. Gather at Sylvester Park and march to the Capitol Building for speeches.
address: Legislative Building - North Steps, Sylvester Park
raw_text:
Flame the Enlightenment

CELEBRATION OF SCIENCE, LEARNING, AND LIBRARIES

Legislative Building - North Steps, Sylvester Park, Olympia, WA

July 12, 2025

11AM-3PM

Carl Sagan, the science popularizer wrote in the book, "Demon-Haunted World: Science as a Candle in the Dark," that attacks on science, education and libraries brought about the Dark Ages. Meet at Sylvester Park, then march to the North Steps of the Capital Building for speakers. Protest the elimination of critical funding to the Institute of Library Sciences (IMLS), cuts to critical science grants, and the attacks on higher education, and public instruction. Please contact Wendy at 360-349-2158 or wendy.tassoni@gmail.com.
raw_summary: The image is an event flyer for "Celebration of Science, Learning, and Libraries," scheduled for July 12, 2025, from 11 AM to 3 PM. It will take place at the Legislative Building - North Steps, Sylvester Park, Olympia, WA. The event is about advocating against attacks on science and education. It includes a march and talks to protest against funding cuts to libraries and education sectors.
